import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OrderService } from '../service/order.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order', templateUrl: './order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order.component.css'] }) export class OrderComponent { constructor(private service:OrderService){ } foodData:any; ngOnInit(): void { this.foodData = this.service.foodDetails; } }
